long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When I log on to Twitter, I want to see a feed of all the interesting things the people I follow have posted. But with the "What's Happening" section, the recommended hashtags and the 
#explore section, there's just too much distraction.

This extension removes those sections from your page to give a lower BS Twitter experience.



THIS EXTENSION DOES NOT COLLECT YOUR DATA IN ANY WAY. All it does is use CSS to remove certain sections. The full source code is available here: https://replit.com/@sarv/nobstwitter
